title: 'Shooting to Kill' (with Cherilyn Mackrory MP)
itunes:title: 'Shooting to Kill' (with Cherilyn Mackrory MP)
description:
Conservative MP Cherilyn Mackrory says her constituents aren't entirely prepared for the energy crisis made worse by the invasion of Ukraine but they are anxious about the war and are not taking their freedoms for granted. Plus, Rebecca Vincent from Reporters Without Borders says Russian forces in Ukraine are targeting journalists and shooting to kill. Vincent tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Yuan Potts the Kremlin is trying to completely isolate Russians from independent information.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Conservative MP Cherilyn Mackrory says her constituents aren't entirely prepared for the energy crisis made worse by the invasion of Ukraine but they are anxious about the war and are not taking their freedoms for granted. Plus, Rebecca Vincent from Reporters Without Borders says Russian forces in Ukraine are targeting journalists and shooting to kill. Vincent tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Yuan Potts the Kremlin is trying to completely isolate Russians from independent information.

itunes:author: Bloomberg
